chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc d a m)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
state = Map prec_list : Set
predta_coacc_0_def_ok : forall (d d' : preDTA) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m)
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
map_or_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> ensemble_base state d (map_or m0 m1)
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool m a = Some b -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
predta_coacc_states_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
pl_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), ensemble_base state d (pl_coacc d pl)
st_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), ensemble_base state d (st_coacc d s)
ad_alloc_opt_optimal_1 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad), Nleb (ad_alloc_opt A m) a = false -> {y : A | MapGet A m a = Some y}
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
map_replace_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (x : A), domain_equal A A m (map_replace A m a x)
coacc_transitive_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc_transitive_def d a a
coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
semantic_equiv_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), st_reconnait d ladj t s -> dta_reconnait d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
map_maxi_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_maxi A x)
map_mini_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_mini A x)
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
lattice_bounded_1 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_0 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (single bool m)
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
lattice_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_1 : forall (m : Map bool) (a a' : ad), MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a' true) a = Some true
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
